import "./VcanciesItem.css" import moment from "moment"; import React, {useRef, useState} from "react"; import ModalVacancies from "../Templates/ModalVacancies/ModalVacancies"; import axios from "axios"; const VacanciesItem =({department,vacancies,status,inputValueGrade})=> { const date = moment().format('YYYY-MM-DD'); return ( <>
{department}
{vacancies.map(vac => (
handleClick(vac.name, vac.grade,vac.id,vac.description,vac.status_id)}>
{vac.name}
{date === vac.create_date ? 'NEW' : ''}
{vac.description}
{moment(vac.create_date).format('DD.MM.YYYY')}
))}
